descriptionHtml:
A great mod compilation that completely revamps and recreates the game! Now...if you're one of those high and hawty creators that throw a bitch fit about your mods "being used without your permission" chill the hell out. You yourself used Bethesda's template(Vanilla game) and the creation kit to make your mod. Thats what's awesome about mods and this awesome site, the fact that someone can make somthing amazing and someone else can take it and build upon it. Now, the orignal maker of this compilation went through an emence amount of work to create patches and long hours of play testing and hell just so those less inclined to do so can still have an awesome game. And I'll leave a discription to the original page where he explains how to download it, and has a list of all the mods used and their respective links to the original mod authors post.

Here is the link: http://forums.goha.ru/showthread_0_0_p152425847
author: The Nexus Mod Community
